item.title: LOG 1.15: Rise and Fall
item.description: 22nd April, 2011 Jananiâ€™s log; Solar date: 220411.12 Last week I had crammed too many activities into my schedule; attending multiple classes, working on the programming, in aerobics, music group and a Greenpeace meeting.

item.title: Home Remedies from south India: Coughs
item.description: Disclaimer: The pictures used in this series are inserted from other websites. I have used them only to illustrate the ingredients used in the remedies.

item.title: Prologue
item.description: They are my songs. You are my song Yet I wander like untied.

item.title: The Shadow
item.description: Black and white, day and night. Contrasts. There can only be one when the other exists. So it is not all that strange that a bright light casts an intense shadow.
